DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to provide an initial assessment of the gastrointestinal safety of a 7-day regimen of PLA-695 compared to placebo or naproxen.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Gastrointestinal Safety of PLA-695 Compared to Placebo and Naproxen
DOC.criteria: Healthy men or women of nonchildbearing potential, aged 18 to 60 years. Abnormal baseline endoscopy. Positive Helicobacter pylori serology.
